text:
Udo Schaefer (October 19, 1926 – August 30, 2019) was a German lawyer and a Bahá'í writer. He was born in Heidelberg, Germany. He was known for his writing "Bahá'í Ethics in Light of Scripture" and '.
Schaefer died on August 30, 2019 at the age of 92.

annotations.surface_form: Bahá'í Ethics in Light of Scripture
